titleStmt.title: The rose, and lily Delivered at the lecture, in Ashby de-la-zouch in the county of Leicester. By William Parks, Master of Arts, and curat of Chelaston in the county of Derby.
titleStmt.author: Parks, William, curat of Chelaston.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.N. for George Wilne, and are to be sold by Samuel Man at the signe of the the [sic] Swan in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: In four parts, each with separate pagination and register.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1475-1640 reel 2013 lacks pages 8 and 9.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.

place.placeName: the signe of the the [sic] Swan in S. Pauls Church-yard
